AltText.MapTitle: Location map of Le Calme guesthouse

LeCalme.Title: Le Calme
LeCalme.Subtitle: Guesthouse in Plessé
LeCalme.Presentation: Nestled in the heart of the Carheil estate in Plessé, Le Calme is a guesthouse designed for lovers of nature, serenity, and authenticity. Surrounded by forests and country trails, it offers a peaceful haven for both relaxation and exploration. Less than an hour from Nantes or the Atlantic coast, our home is the ideal starting point to explore the region: hiking, cycling, local markets, or canoeing on the Nantes–Brest canal... Here, everything invites you to slow down and breathe.
LeCalme.Menu:
We take care of you, right down to your plate!
If you’d like to enjoy a meal on site, that’s absolutely possible. Whether it’s a simple dinner or a more gourmet menu, we’ll prepare together what you’re in the mood for. Just let us know in advance, and we’ll take care of everything so you can simply enjoy the moment.

Booking.Title: Booking & Prices
Booking.DirectReservation: Reservations can be made by calling us directly at 0768170686, and you can then benefit from a rate of €80. Payment is possible via WERO.
Booking.BookingReservation: If you prefer, you can also book through our partner (rates may vary).
Booking.ReservationDelay: Please book your meal at least 48 hours in advance
Booking.Breakfast: You can also enjoy breakfast on site for €13 per person
Booking.BreakfastMenu: Coffee, tea, pastries, jams, and toast will be served

Modalities.Title: Stay Information
Modalities.Times: We will be happy to welcome you from 4 PM, and check-out should be before 10 AM
Modalities.Wifi: Wi-Fi is available throughout your stay
Modalities.Parking: We have a private parking area for your vehicles and storage for your bikes
Modalities.Smoking: The guesthouse is a non-smoking area
Modalities.Kids: Unfortunately, we do not have the space to accommodate children

Location.Address: To visit us: 1 Av. de la Vall. Dom. Carheil, 44630 Plessé

Distance.Nantes: Nantes: approximately 45 km southeast of Plessé, about 45 minutes by car.
Distance.Rennes: Rennes: approximately 85 km northwest of Plessé, about 1 hour and 15 minutes by car.
Distance.SaintNazaire: Saint-Nazaire: approximately 55 km southeast of Plessé, about 45 minutes by car.
Distance.Vannes: Vannes: approximately 75 km west of Plessé, about 1 hour by car.

Location.Title: Find Us

NatureWalks.Title: Walks in the estate
NatureWalks.Description: Explore the peaceful trails around the Carheil estate.

LakeRecreation.Title: Buhel leisure center
LakeRecreation.Description: Canoeing, treetop adventures, paddleboarding... just 10 minutes away.

LocalCulture.Title: Culture and Heritage
LocalCulture.Description: Discover Plessé, its artisans, and its castles.
